name: MadTracker 2 Pattern
summary: Learn about .MTP files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: MTP files are created when you save a pattern in MadTracker. The file is created in order to store your pattern information. To create an MTP file, select Pattern → Save... and choose the save location. MTP files are saved by default in the following location:
To load an MTP file, select Pattern → Load... and navigate to the location of the MTP file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
